## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Compat - DiaColloDB utilities: compatibility modules: top-level wrappers

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::Compat;
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## Utilities
 
 $bool = $that->usecompat($pkg);
 \&dummyMethodCode = $that->nocompat($methodName);
 

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Compat is a top-level convenience package for
limited (read-only) backwards-compatible access to outdated
DiaColloDB data structures and file formats.
By convention, individual compatibility wrappers for a DiaColloDB release
with version E<lt>= C<X.Y.Z> reside in the namespace
C<DiaColloDB::Compat::vX_Y_Z>, where the C<"_Z"> suffix is omitted if it
consists only of zeroes.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Compat: Globals
=pod

=head2 Globals

=over 4

=item Variable: @ISA

DiaColloDB::Compat
inherits from
L<DiaColloDB::Logger|DiaColloDB::Logger>.

=back

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Compat: Utilities
=pod

=head2 Utilities

=over 4

=item usecompat

 $bool = $that->usecompat($pkg);

Attempts to C<"use DiaColloDB::Compat::$pkg">, throwing an error on failure.

=item nocompat

 \&dummyMethodCode = $that->nocompat($methodName);

Wrapper-generator for subclasses which do not implement some API methods.

=back

=cut
